headline: Disney (DIS): Rethinking Valuation After Bernstein Reaffirms Outperform on Streaming-Led Earnings Outlook
summary: Walt Disney (DIS) just came out of a mixed earnings report with a vote of confidence from Bernstein, which reaffirmed its Outperform call as streaming operating income jumped 39% even while legacy entertainment revenue slipped. See our latest analysis for Walt Disney. That backdrop has not yet translated into a strong rebound in the shares, with a roughly flat year to date share price return and a weaker 1 year total shareholder return, but the positive 3 year total shareholder return hints...
